title: Short Coat, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk, lined with cotton
Technique: damask weave, satin weave embroidered with satin stitches
description: Short flared coat of lemon yellow damask with loose, all-over design of arabesques and rosettes. Neck and front edges deeply banded with black satin, with frogs of the same. Deep sleeve bands of black satin embroidered with floral embroidery in blue and white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Short Coat, 19th century.Medium: silk, lined with cotton
Technique: damask weave, satin weave embroidered with satin stitches. 1956-55-2.
